nodes.text: In 0 ABY, a battle took place near the planet Teptixii in the Unknown Regions between the forces of the Galactic Empire under the command of Captain Voss Parck and elements of Nuso Esva's navy. After the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Chimaera, under the command of Captain Calo Drusan, came to Parck's assistance, Esva's forces fled to hyperspace.
